Name: transient global amnesia
Definition: An amnestic disorder that is characterized by temporary but almost total disruption of short-term memory with a range of problems accessing older memories.

Name: retrograde amnesia
Definition: An amnestic disorder that involves a loss of one's pre-existing memories to conscious recollection.

Name: anterograde amnesia
Definition: An amnestic disorder that involves the impaired or lost ability to memorize new things.
